review: Totally got ripped off on this one. The shows I watch are free on my Kindle Fire HDX and PC, but you have to pay to watch them on the Fire TV. Not what I was expecting.Editing this one: This is not about PRIME shows. I should have clarified. I bought the FIRE TV under the impression (From the Kindle sales person)that everything I watched on my Kindle Fire HDX for FREE would also be able to be watched on the FIRE TV for free as well. This is not the case. The Fire TV does not allow all of the same apps that the HDX does. That was my source of disappointment in the FIRE TV. Free viewing on my PC and HDX of certain shows were pay to view only on the FIRE TV. I hope that explains my issue better.As far as the unit itself - it is an excellent device, no issues with streaming glitches or anything of that nature. Very easy to use, and Amazon adds new content all of the time.

review: It works great for a family that's in a city with great internet and just wants to watch things online.I don't even know why they attached a USB port.  If you hook your EXTERNAL USB drive into it (which for me has 400 of my own movies on it)  the Fire will not play them.Making this NOT a MEDIA PLAYER but more of a just a Internet Only..netflix...amazon..hulu player.If the fire was able to play external movies Via the USB port this would be hands down the best device ever created.shame.
